estuary.model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • estuary.model.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tickable, java.io.Serializable

    public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
implements Tickable, java.io.Serializable
    The Model contains all the data and logic for each subgame of our Estuary game.
    Version:
    1.0 Oct 25, 2016
    Author:
    Sean
